mapper.insert: insert into station_power_cut (station_no, date, start_time, end_time, user_num) values (#{stationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into station_power_cut
station_no,
date,
start_time,
end_time,
user_num,
#{stationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: SELECT station_power_cut.station_no, station_power_cut.date, station_power_cut.start_time, station_power_cut.end_time, station_power_cut.user_num FROM station_power_cut WHERE date LIKE '%${month}%'
SELECT station_power_cut.station_no, station_power_cut.date, station_power_cut.start_time, station_power_cut.end_time, station_power_cut.user_num FROM station_power_cut WHERE date LIKE '%2018/8/%'
